alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo County through 445 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antelope Wells, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Very heavy rain will cause arroyos to run and flooding of low water crossings. Locations impacted include... Antelope Wells, Alamo Hueco and Playas Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
